item.title: HiCo: Hierarchical Controllable Diffusion Model for Layout-to-image Generation
item.description: HiCo: Hierarchical Controllable Diffusion Model achieves superior layout-to-image generation by disentangling spatial layouts through a multi-branch network structure, resulting in high-quality images…
